projectGridLines.title: Title: Mechanical and Robotics Engineer Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Mechanical and Robotics Engineer Intern

Description:

As a Mechanical and Robotics Engineer Intern at CBAI Technologies Private Limited , key responsibilities will

include:

1. Develop algorithms and control systems for drone navigation, stabilization, and autonomy. 2. Integrate

sensors, actuators, and other hardware components to enable advanced robotic capabilit ies in drones. 3. Design

and implement motion planning algorithms for efficient and safe drone operation in various environments . 4.

Collaborate with the mechanical and electronics teams to ensure seamless integration of robotics systems with

other drone components. 5. Conduct testing and validation of robotic systems in simulation and real-world

scenarios. 6. Optimize the performance of robotic systems through analysis, tuning, and iteration. 7. Design and

develop mechanical components and structures for drones, including frames, propulsion systems, and payloads .

8. Stay updated with advancements in robotics technology and apply them to enhance drone capabilities .

Skill sets: Robotics, Programming skills (C++ , Python), Communication

Traits expectation: Inquisit ive, open-minded

Expected learning: Mechanical design, sensor integration, develop software architectures for mass

produced mapping drones

Specific courses required for project execution: NIA
